page.title: 02THE WORK OF PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: There are 12 people in the{Wembury {Parish Council.}5 of them are from {Heybrook Bay}and the other 7 are from {Wembury.}The 5 from this polling dis- trict are{Mr.D.MacBean(Vice_Chairman), {Mrs.Hart,Mr.Goddard, Mr.Newnham,Mrs. {Drought. The Council}meets every month and talk about what's going on in the village.There are{693 electors in this{polling district.}The{PC looks after the{footpaths.}they employ a man to repair the{signposts}and to keep the{pathways}clear.There are sev- eral applications for plans and the{PC recommends if you may or may not build your extension.{The Clerk}to the{PC, {Mrs Williams}kindly came into the sch- ool to tell us about her work. The children want to take part in a spons- ored walk with the{PTA}and the{PC}a- round the bounds of the parish. This was last done in 1977. It's about 9m.
